Modals

Modals can be nice to show something full screen.

File to include

@include "components/modals";

Normal

Title

Button 
<div class="modal">
     <input type="checkbox" name="" id="openModal7" class="check-open-modal" />
     <label for="openModal7" class="btn btn-rectangle btn-primary">Open modal</label>
     <div class="modal-container no-anim">
          <label for="openModal7" class="check-close-modal"><i class="icon icon-cross-solid"></i></label>
          <div class="cards">
               <div class="cards-image" style="background: url(/assets/images/pic-card.jpg)"></div>
               <div class="cards-content">
                    <h4><a href="#">Title</a></h4>
                    <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris semperâ¦ Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris semper</p>
                    <a href="#" class="btn">Button</a>
               </div>
          </div>
     </div>
</div>
